name: Life simulator
description:
Original illustration 3840x2160 px 


" Life simulator" seeks to represent what the new media and blockchain technology allowed to achieve, which is creative freedom and the possibility for many people who are living lives they do not like to find in art the way to something better, something more enjoyable and something happier. This work tells in part my experience but I am sure that many people could also feel identified since at the end of the day we all at some point pretend to live something we did not want and drown the artist that we always carry inside. The world is full of great artists who deserve to shine and decentralization thanks to new technologies are the means to reach that goal, democratizing access to art can be a reality for everyone.

Technique used:
flat vector design
